behavior insert_coffee_filter(coffee_filter: item, coffee_maker: item):
    body:
        achieve inside(coffee_filter, coffee_maker)

behavior insert_coffee_grounds(coffee_grounds: item, coffee_maker: item):
    body:
        achieve inside(coffee_grounds, coffee_maker)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_filter: item where:
            is_coffee_filter(coffee_filter)
        # Select a coffee filter
        
        bind coffee_grounds: item where:
            is_food_cereal(coffee_grounds)
        # Select coffee grounds

        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        # Select a coffee maker
        
        insert_coffee_filter(coffee_filter, coffee_maker)
        insert_coffee_grounds(coffee_grounds, coffee_maker)

def is_coffee_maker_ready(coffee_maker:item):
    # Function to check if the coffee maker is ready and can be filled
    symbol coffee_maker_ready=exists c: item : is_coffe_maker(c) and clean(c) and open(c) and unplug
ged(c)
    return coffee_maker_ready

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        # Select the coffee maker

        if not is_coffee_maker_ready(coffee_maker):
            prepare_coffee_maker(coffee_maker)
            # Ensure the coffee maker is prepared for use

        bind water_source: item where:
            is_sink(water_source) and clean(water_source) and open(water_source)
        # Select a clean and open sink or faucet as the water source

        bind coffee_grounds: item where:
            is_food_food(coffee_grounds)
        # Select the coffee grounds

        achieve has_water(coffee_maker)
        # Fill the coffee maker with water

        achieve inside(coffee_grounds, coffee_maker)
        # Place coffee grounds inside the coffee maker

behavior fill_coffee_maker_with_water_and_grounds(coffee_maker:item, water_source:item, coffee_groun
ds:item):
    body:
        # Ensure the coffee maker is open before filling
        achieve open(coffee_maker)
        
        # Fill coffee maker with water
        achieve close_char(char, water_source)
        is_milk(coffee_maker) 

        # Add coffee grounds to the coffee maker
        achieve inside(coffee_grounds, coffee_maker)

        # Close coffee maker after filling
        achieve closed(coffee_maker)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        
        bind water_source: item where:
            is_sink(water_source)
        
        bind coffee_grounds: item where:
            is_coffee_filter(coffee_grounds)
        
        fill_coffee_maker_with_water_and_grounds(coffee_maker, water_source, coffee_grounds)

behavior add_water_to_coffee_maker(coffee_maker: item):
    body:
        achieve has_water(coffee_maker)

behavior add_coffee_grounds_to_coffee_maker(coffee_maker: item, coffee_grounds: item):
    body:
        achieve inside(coffee_grounds, coffee_maker)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)

        bind coffee_grounds: item where:
            is_coffee_filter(coffee_grounds)

        add_water_to_coffee_maker(coffee_maker)
        add_coffee_grounds_to_coffee_maker(coffee_maker, coffee_grounds)
